thread.title: Navajo Police confirm missing Alamo juvenile has been found
thread.title_full: Navajo Police confirm missing Alamo juvenile has been found

author: Regina Barnett
title: Navajo Police confirm missing Alamo juvenile has been found
text:
Navajo Police confirm missing Alamo juvenile has been found
Navajo Police confirmed that a juvenile reported missing from the Alamo Navajo Reservation on Jan. 20 has been located and cleared, though no additional information has been released.
The missing person alert was issued for 14-year-old Samuel Pinal, who was last seen around 4 p.m. that day after getting off his school bus in Alamo. He had been entered into the National Crime Information Center.
Navajo Police said only that Pinal was cleared as of Jan. 20. The department did not provide the circumstances surrounding his recovery or his condition.
summary: Navajo Police confirm missing Alamo juvenile has been found Navajo Police confirmed that a juvenile reported missing from the Alamo Navajo Reservation on Jan. 20 has been located and cleared, though no additional information has been released. The missing person alert was issued for 14-year-old Samuel Pinal, who was last seen around 4 p.m. that day after getting off his school bus in Alamo. He had been entered into the National Crime Information Center. Navajo Police said only that Pinal was cleared as of Jan. 20. The department did not provide the circumstances surrounding his recovery or his condition.
